BR_text.BRsummary: Failed GPU optimizer test with mixed precision
BR_text.BRdescription:
System information
 
 OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): CI
 TensorFlow version and how it was installed (source or binary): CI
 TensorFlow-Addons version and how it was installed (source or binary): CI
 Python version: CI
 Is GPU used? (yes/no): yes
 
 
 GPU test is broken after <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/commit/bd5bbfc66e750cba94360236e7f85481662ba4de>bd5bbfc</denchmark-link>
 .
 <denchmark-link:https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/147c0642-7973-429b-87b1-b8f1b1d2cb14/log>https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/147c0642-7973-429b-87b1-b8f1b1d2cb14/log</denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text: In the meantime check if we could bypass with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/pull/1943>#1943</denchmark-link>

comments_3.comment_text: We can close this and just add <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/pull/1951#issuecomment-651004300>#1951 (comment)</denchmark-link>

comments_4.comment_text:
We can close this and just add #1951 (comment)
